channel.title: Quick Question and Need advice
channel.description:
First, Quick question = My inventory tabs includes a green and a blue quest tab. There are a ton of guides telling us how to edit the blue one simple enough. Where would I find out how to edit the green one. I have played a few servers where they have used it as a spawn tab etc. But I was wondering if there is a way to find out....I can reply some codes if needed. Thanks.
Need Advice = I want to work on something similar to the DeviousPK's npc gambler. The player "uses" an item on the npc and the npc rolls a dice. I want to make it do 55x2 host. I have added everything so far. I just want to know how would I go about adding a code to my useitemonnpc.java to allow a player to use any item on the npc. Thanks. PS. How would I restrict certain items also such as coins.

item.title: Quick Question and Need advice
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

portugalrox:

I did this but the tab is completely blank. So it doesn’t say anything in it. Thanks though sk8r

Did you add the command correctly?
Did you use the command after compiling and etc?

Because how the command works it sends the value of “i” to the interface text that is also i.

So, line 4975 (whatever it would be) would say “4975” on it. And so on.

However, if you have other methods that are clearing/changing the text in something like process() of client.java, they will still be invoked and will still edit the text.

[quote=“Project-Storm, post:2, topic:550455”]And sk8r was getting rude towards me LOL.
It’s cus you’re not reading idiot.[/quote]
Yeah, I’m going to be rude towards you when this is how you respond to people that don’t understand something.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question and Need advice
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

To answer your first question:
Make a command to clear all interface text and set them as their IDs.
Note: You will need to restart your client after your finished. Also, the command will take a while to “process” and the client will seem frozen. Let it do it’s thing.

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("clear")) { for(int i = 0; i < 30000; i++) { c.getPA().sendFrame126(Integer.toString(i), i); } }

Then use the command and look at the achievement tab.
In a few moments, once the command is done executing, you’ll see all the ID’s.

We’ll work on the second thing once you’ve done this.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question and Need advice
item.dc:creator: @Project-Storm Project-Storm
item.description:
@Project-Storm wrote:

Only because you canceled our teamviewer session, because you’re scared I’m going to hack or attack your computer, or whatever you issue is about that, maybe you shouldn’t be asking people for help when you won’t even trust them to help you? How stupid are you? But shit I guess leechers, leech, and kids will be kids!

RsInterfaces.java Client sided;

//Achievement tab
addText(29295, “Whatever the fuck you want it to say here”, 0xFF981F, false, true, -1, TDA, 2);
addHoverText(29296, “If you want to be able to click the text”, " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(29297, “and have it popup with something, you need to add”, " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(29298, “more interfaces, and interface ID’s”, " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(29299, “this also doesn’t include a background”, " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(29300, “because you cancelled out teamviewer”, “”, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(29301, “like a bitch cus you’re scared I’ll do something?”, “”, TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(29302, “or whatever your problem is.”, " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(29303, “Here’s your free code, figure out the rest”, " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addText(29304, “since you don’t trust me kid or anyone”, 0xFF981F, false, true, -1, TDA, 2);
addHoverText(29305, “”, “”, TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(29306, “”, “”, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(29307, “”, " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(29308, “”, " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(29309, “”, " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addText(29310, “”, 0xFF981F, false, true, -1, TDA, 2);
addHoverText(29311, “”, " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(29312, “”, " ", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(29313, “”, “”, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
addHoverText(29314, “”, “”, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);
} catch(Exception e){
